name: The Deepest Fish
description:
Hone your fishing skills and hunt for the deepest fish! Travel to exotic locations as you catch new and more challenging fish.  

You play as Trevor, a lone fisherman who doesn't have a lot of money... yet. Trevor only has his trusty fishing rod, a radio and the clothes on his back. Begin in the cold rainy rivers before embarking on your exhilarating  journey to earn money, and to find the deepest fish. 

HOW TO PLAY:
Press SPACE to cast your line, then when you see the mark, press space again to reel in. Then dodge the bubbles with WASD to catch your fish.
PRESS THE PAPER IN THE TOP RIGHT TO PROGRESS.

MAC USERS DOWNLOAD:
Unfortunately Mac users need a little more juice in order to get their download working, you will need to input a couple lines of code into terminal to allow it to run.

1.  Drag the Game into the Applications folder
2. Open the Terminal by pressing the Command Key and the Space Key at the same time then typing Terminal
3. Type: chmod +x /Applications/TheDeepestFish.app/contents/MacOS/The\ Deepest\ Fish
4. Type: xattr -r -d com.apple.quarantine /Applications/TheDeepestFish.app/contents/MacOS/The\ Deepest\ Fish
5. If it says you don't have permission to run the game, go to settings and in security and privacy press allow to run

A lot of you have been saying that you love the music, so you can find the full tracks here - https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC9SDF3iKjCEx2K0myfGQjSg
